code:
items = [(50, 10), (40, 20), (30, 30), (20, 40), (10, 50)]
capacity = 100

items.sort(key=lambda x: x[0]/x[1], reverse=True)

result = []
while items and capacity:
    item = items.pop()
    if item[1] <= capacity:
        capacity -= item[1]
        result.append(item)
    else:
        result.append((item[0], capacity))
        capacity = 0

print(sum(val for val, _ in result))
prompt: Fractional knapsack with multiple items yaz.
